title: Bridal Mehndi Design
description: Elegant full-hand bridal henna with floral motifs and intricate paisley patterns. Applied for a traditional Indian wedding. Lasted over 10 days.

title: Floral Henna Tattoo
description: Delicate floral and vine design on the back of the hand. Perfect for summer events or casual wear. Natural henna for safe, temporary art.

title: Arabic Style Henna
description: Bold Arabic-inspired geometric patterns on feet. Customized for a cultural festival. Highlights symmetry and bold lines.

title: Minimalist Arm Design
description: Simple yet stunning minimalist henna on the arm, featuring dots and swirls. Great for first-timers or modern aesthetics.
